00125 #define WDOG_INIT_DEFAULT                                                                        \
00126   { true,               /* Start watchdog when init done */                                      \
00127     false,              /* WDOG not counting during debug halt */                                \
00128     false,              /* WDOG not counting when in EM2 */                                      \
00129     false,              /* WDOG not counting when in EM3 */                                      \
00130     false,              /* EM4 can be entered */                                                 \
00131     false,              /* Do not block disabling LFRCO/LFXO in CMU */                           \
00132     false,              /* Do not lock WDOG configuration (if locked, reset needed to unlock) */ \
00133     wdogClkSelULFRCO,   /* Select 1kHZ WDOG oscillator */                                        \
00134     wdogPeriod_256k     /* Set longest possible timeout period */                                \
00135   }
